apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'Merman' emoji with a dark skin tone is rendered with a captivating, mythical aura, featuring a powerful, scaled tail that transitions smoothly from his torso.  Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give the scales an iridescent shimmer, while the soft rounded edges of his form lend a sense of benevolent power.  This fantastical emoji on Apple devices can symbolize mystery, the ocean, folklore, or a sense of magical wonder in digital communication.
